resumen:
We work one-on-one with teachers to create incredible educational tours that meet their specific needs and budget. All Explorica tours are fully inclusive and expertly designed to immerse participants in the local culture while introducing them to the people, places and experiences that make each destination unique.

Explorica is committed to enriching students through educational travel, and that means helping teachers extend the opportunity to as many students as possible. In addition to offering the guaranteed best prices in educational travel, we also provide scholarships, need-based financial assistance, and a variety of resources to ensure that every student is able to join their classmates on the trip of a lifetime.

Explorica is a part of WorldStrides, the global leader in educational travel and experiential learning. WorldStrides was founded in 1967 to provide middle school travel programs to Washington, D.C., and has grown to provide a wide range of programs for more than 550,000 students annually to over 100 countries around the world. WorldStrides offers experiential learning programs in educational travel, performing arts, language immersion, career exploration, service-learning, study abroad, and sports. Each of these experiences helps students to see beyond the classroom and to see the world ‚Äì and themselves ‚Äì in new ways. www.worldstrides.com

resumen:
OI is the digital media division of Ole Communications, an international media company based in Miami, FL and pioneer of the pay TV industry in Latin America. Founder of HBO Latin America, A+E Networks Latin America and E! Network Latin America, Ole Communications has a proven track record of building successful media ventures in Latin America.

OI is made up of a diverse & innovative group of digital media experts based in Miami, Mexico City, S√£o Paulo, Bogota, Buenos Aires, Caracas & Barcelona. Our company operates across three core competencies to deliver engaging stories to audiences around the world.

resumen:
For over 25 years, Globalsat Group has been at the forefront of mobile satellite services (MSS) across the Americas, serving a broad spectrum of industries including energy, government, defense, media, mining, finance, agriculture, NGOs, and tourism. Our solutions are designed to support mission-critical operations where seamless connectivity is essential.

We are driven by a commitment to leverage satellite technology for social and environmental impact. Our dedication has been recognized with the prestigious MSUA Satellite Mobility Innovation Award for two consecutive years, in 2023 and 2024.

Globalsat Group simplifies market access and logistics for our partners and clients across the Pan-American region. With a US distribution hub and a network of offices spanning the US, Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Central America & the Caribbean, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, and Peru, we ensure our customers receive reliable and effective support wherever they operate.

At the heart of Globalsat Group is a people-first philosophy. Our core values‚Äîtrust, customer focus, and innovation‚Äîguide us in delivering superior service. This client-centered approach has not only garnered industry recognition, such as the "Top Land Mobility Satcom Innovation Award" and Frost & Sullivan's "Latin American Satellite Communications Company of the Year" on multiple occasions, but also the trust of our clients.

As we celebrate our 25th anniversary in 2024, we extend our heartfelt gratitude to our partners, colleagues, and customers who have been integral to our journey of innovation. Looking ahead, Globalsat Group remains committed to expanding our reach and delivering world-class satellite communication services to businesses and governments worldwide.

resumen:
isEazy is a leading technology company specializing in e-learning solutions for corporate training, communication, and knowledge management. 

We offer a seamless, end-to-end training experience, providing all the tools organizations need to manage, design, and optimize their learning processes. 

Our team of experts is based across our offices in Spain, Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, and the United States, supported by a strong network of international partners. 

With over 22 years of experience and more than 10 million users, we have successfully delivered 100,000+ projects across 90+ countries for 1,000 clients worldwide. 

Thanks to our six proprietary e-learning tools, we make e-learning technology accessible to everyone: 

isEazy Author ‚Äì A cloud-based authoring tool powered by AI to design and share e-learning content. 

isEazy Factory ‚Äì A fast-track course design factory to create custom training in record time. 

isEazy Skills ‚Äì The most comprehensive catalog to develop your team‚Äôs power skills. 

isEazy LMS ‚Äì A next-generation, all-in-one online training platform. 

isEazy Engage ‚Äì The go-to app for frontline workers. 

isEazy Game ‚Äì A gamification app designed for corporate training. 

What are you waiting for? Join the new era of e-learning‚ÄîAI made easy! üöÄ

resumen:
Nearsoft helps you grow your development team with a dedicated team of +300 engineers in Mexico.  You end with *one* integrated team, where everybody speaks the same language, shares the same values, and gets up and goes to sleep at the same time.

Companies come to us because they are,

1. Disappointed with "offshoring".
2. Frustrated because they can't scale their software development team.
3. Tired of late product releases and poor quality.

We work exclusively with software product companies like OpenTable, Switchfly, Points, JumpstartMD, and others.

And now, we are Encora:

resumen:
At Curioso, we are designers and business-minded thinkers working together to create spaces that are meaningful for the people who experience them. 
Established in 2013, Curioso is led by co-founders Nina Grondin and Daniel Pierce.  They are joined by a diverse team of 50 talented, collaborative, and curious design experts.   

Based in Chicago and Merida, Mexico, we help companies around the world create unique brand experiences or reinvent existing ones. We work alongside our clients to tackle ambitious design and innovation challenges‚Äîthe kind of things you don‚Äôt know how to face but can‚Äôt afford not to.  

We understand that the secret to doing this is not simply having the great ideas or the creative vision.  It‚Äôs about having the right people at the table and working in a highly flexible and collaborative manner to get things done.

resumen:
Guzzo & Co is a global mortgage brokerage committed to delivering innovative and tailored financing solutions. Founded on the principles of integrity, expertise, and client-first service, Guzzo & Co has grown into a trusted name in mortgage lending, serving borrowers across North America, Europe, and Southeast Asia.

With a deep understanding of both domestic and international lending markets, we provide comprehensive mortgage solutions for residential and investment properties. Our team of experienced professionals works closely with clients to navigate the complexities of home financing, ensuring a seamless and efficient process.

From first-time homebuyers to seasoned investors, Guzzo & Co delivers expert mortgage guidance, competitive rates, and a commitment to excellence that has defined our company since its inception.

resumen:
Somos la gu√≠a esencial en espa√±ol para l√≠deres visionarios.

Ofrecemos a nuestros lectores contenido de alto valor con rigor y veracidad sobre innovaci√≥n y tendencias del mundo empresarial ayud√°ndolos a mejorar la toma de decisiones en su vida cotidiana.

Siguiendo la l√≠nea de nuestra matriz en Estados Unidos (MIT SMR) exploramos c√≥mo el liderazgo y la gesti√≥n se est√°n transformando en un mundo disruptivo. 

Ayudamos a los l√≠deres reflexivos a aprovechar las apasionantes oportunidades -y a enfrentarse a los retos- que surgen a medida que las fuerzas tecnol√≥gicas, sociales y medioambientales reconfiguran la forma en que las organizaciones operan, compiten y crean valor. 

Alentamos los comentarios, las preguntas y las sugerencias. Respetamos y apreciamos el punto de vista de nuestra audiencia; sin embargo, nos reservamos el derecho de eliminar o desactivar comentarios a discreci√≥n de nuestro moderador. 

Los comentarios que infrinjan nuestras directrices (v√©ase m√°s abajo) o utilicen un lenguaje que el personal de MIT SMR M√©xico considere abusivo, ofensivo, vulgar o de naturaleza intimidatoria ser√°n eliminados inmediatamente. Los reincidentes podr√°n ser bloqueados indefinidamente. 

Directrices para comentarios en LinkedIn establecidos por nuestra matriz en Estados Unidos, MIT Sloan Management Review:

1. 1. Respeto. Los debates est√°n muy bien, pero los ataques no. Cualquier comentario que cree un ambiente hostil ser√° eliminado. 

2. 2. Discurso de odio. Los comentarios que contengan acoso, racismo, homofobia, sexismo o cualquier otra forma de incitaci√≥n al odio ser√°n eliminados.

3. 3. Lenguaje. Los mensajes vulgares pueden ofender a otros lectores y ser√°n eliminados. 

4. 4. Datos personales. Cualquier comentario con informaci√≥n personal (direcci√≥n, n√∫mero de tel√©fono, etc.) ser√° eliminado.

resumen:
RITMO is a cash flow management platform for e-commerce businesses in Europe and LATAM. RITMO‚Äôs all-in-one financial solution enables e-commerce to efficiently manage their cross-border payments and get access to flexible funding, making it easier for e-commerce entrepreneurs to spend time on building incredible businesses. 

Through this range of products, we are embedded in the day to day operations of our clients, offering financing for growth and enabling merchants to extend payment terms with suppliers.

resumen:
Sunwise es una compa√±√≠a creada para brindar una soluci√≥n √∫nica y total al mercado creciente de la energ√≠a solar en los diferentes sectores comerciales: residencial, comercial e industrial. 

La eficiencia del integrador de paneles solares es esencial para lograr el √©xito. Por esta raz√≥n en Sunwise creemos que la mejor manera de poder emprender un negocio de energ√≠a solar es mediante el uso de la tecnolog√≠a. Evitando procesos tediosos, largos y manuales que son susceptibles a errores. Creando un producto que considere todas las variables necesarias para el calculo, presentaci√≥n y seguimiento del proceso de ventas, administraci√≥n y operaci√≥n de un proyecto de energ√≠a solar, logramos reducir costos, aumentar eficiencias, generar m√°s ventas y m√°s recomendados.

resumen:
Transpara‚Äôs Visual KPI is real-time dashboards, KPIs, alerting and analytics software for operations.  Check out https://www.transpara.com or read on...

Visual KPI is the only on-demand mobile operations monitoring, alerting and analytics solution that provides obvious, real-time, visual data on your any device. It aggregates operations, IoT/IIoT, enterprise, financial and infrastructure information from thousands of existing data sources and delivers role-based, actionable Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to users wherever they are. Easily create and customize KPIs, scorecards, trends and alerts without any programming, using information from any combination of existing data sources, including the OSIsoft PI System, Rockwell FactoryTalk, AVEVA Wonderware Historian, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, mySQL, SAP, OLEDB/ODBC, JSON or XML web services and thousands of others. Visual KPI runs on any device with a web browser and the server can live on-premise, hosted or in the cloud. 

Thank you for visiting us on LinkedIn!

resumen:
We work one-on-one with teachers to create incredible educational tours that meet their specific needs and budget. All Explorica tours are fully inclusive and expertly designed to immerse participants in the local culture while introducing them to the people, places and experiences that make each destination unique.

Explorica is committed to enriching students through educational travel, and that means helping teachers extend the opportunity to as many students as possible. In addition to offering the guaranteed best prices in educational travel, we also provide scholarships, need-based financial assistance, and a variety of resources to ensure that every student is able to join their classmates on the trip of a lifetime.

Explorica is a part of WorldStrides, the global leader in educational travel and experiential learning. WorldStrides was founded in 1967 to provide middle school travel programs to Washington, D.C., and has grown to provide a wide range of programs for more than 550,000 students annually to over 100 countries around the world. WorldStrides offers experiential learning programs in educational travel, performing arts, language immersion, career exploration, service-learning, study abroad, and sports. Each of these experiences helps students to see beyond the classroom and to see the world ‚Äì and themselves ‚Äì in new ways. www.worldstrides.com

resumen:
For over 25 years, Globalsat Group has been at the forefront of mobile satellite services (MSS) across the Americas, serving a broad spectrum of industries including energy, government, defense, media, mining, finance, agriculture, NGOs, and tourism. Our solutions are designed to support mission-critical operations where seamless connectivity is essential.

We are driven by a commitment to leverage satellite technology for social and environmental impact. Our dedication has been recognized with the prestigious MSUA Satellite Mobility Innovation Award for two consecutive years, in 2023 and 2024.

Globalsat Group simplifies market access and logistics for our partners and clients across the Pan-American region. With a US distribution hub and a network of offices spanning the US, Argentina, Bolivia, Brazil, Central America & the Caribbean, Chile, Colombia, Ecuador, Mexico, and Peru, we ensure our customers receive reliable and effective support wherever they operate.

At the heart of Globalsat Group is a people-first philosophy. Our core values‚Äîtrust, customer focus, and innovation‚Äîguide us in delivering superior service. This client-centered approach has not only garnered industry recognition, such as the "Top Land Mobility Satcom Innovation Award" and Frost & Sullivan's "Latin American Satellite Communications Company of the Year" on multiple occasions, but also the trust of our clients.

As we celebrate our 25th anniversary in 2024, we extend our heartfelt gratitude to our partners, colleagues, and customers who have been integral to our journey of innovation. Looking ahead, Globalsat Group remains committed to expanding our reach and delivering world-class satellite communication services to businesses and governments worldwide.

resumen:
‚ñ† We create, launch & support highly specialized travel brands that change the world for the better. ‚ñ†

We are a global network of tourism experts, who create, launch and support highly specialized, individually branded travel services. All our services are led by passionate intrapreneurs with an extraordinary travel expertise.

‚ñ† Our Purpose ‚ñ†

In the past, journeys were pulled from the catalogues of mass-marketed travel operators. But this is changing. More and more travellers prefer unique journeys that suit their taste, interests and budget. At the same time, they look for authentic and sustainable journeys that make a positive impact on both their own life and the communities they visit.

We believe that journeys like this can not be created ‚Äúoff-the-shelf‚Äù. Only passionate specialists will be able to organise unique, authentic and responsible trips.

This is why we encourage these passionate specialists to create their own brands - while we have their back. By adding a professional framework to their expertise we create reliable yet unforgettable travel experiences.

resumen:
isEazy is a leading technology company specializing in e-learning solutions for corporate training, communication, and knowledge management. 

We offer a seamless, end-to-end training experience, providing all the tools organizations need to manage, design, and optimize their learning processes. 

Our team of experts is based across our offices in Spain, Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, and the United States, supported by a strong network of international partners. 

With over 22 years of experience and more than 10 million users, we have successfully delivered 100,000+ projects across 90+ countries for 1,000 clients worldwide. 

Thanks to our six proprietary e-learning tools, we make e-learning technology accessible to everyone: 

isEazy Author ‚Äì A cloud-based authoring tool powered by AI to design and share e-learning content. 

isEazy Factory ‚Äì A fast-track course design factory to create custom training in record time. 

isEazy Skills ‚Äì The most comprehensive catalog to develop your team‚Äôs power skills. 

isEazy LMS ‚Äì A next-generation, all-in-one online training platform. 

isEazy Engage ‚Äì The go-to app for frontline workers. 

isEazy Game ‚Äì A gamification app designed for corporate training. 

What are you waiting for? Join the new era of e-learning‚ÄîAI made easy! üöÄ

resumen:
The Mexican Electronics Telecommunications and Information Technologies Industries Chamber has more than 25 years in our country and is an entity representing the Electronics, Telecommunications and Information Tecnology Sector in Mexico, which promotes the development of said sector in a global environment with high quality services.

CANIETI is a public interest, autonomous institution with legal status and capital of its own, different from that of its members, established according to what is provided in the Act of Business Chambers and their Confederations.

Our main objective is to achieve the competitive development of the National Industry with a guild sense and social responsibility.

Individuals or corporations legally established both in the Mexican Republic and abroad, usually engaged in activities related to the electronics, telecommunications or informatics sectors, affiliate in CANIETI.

The Chamber is made up by more than 1000 member companies all over Mexico, gathered to defend and watch their rights and common interests. 

In 2003, 2004, 2006 and 2077 CANIETI received the National Prize of Ethics and Values awarded by the National Confederation of Industrial Chambers (CONCAMIN) to the body that shows commitment and social responsibility both for its members and the society in general.

History
- 1935  Association of Radio Distributors of Mexico City 
- 1940  Mexican Association of Radio Industrialists 
- 1945  Mexican Association of Radio and Television 
- 1950  National Association of the Electronics Industry  
- 1957  National Chamber of the Electronics and Electric Communications Industries. CANIECE 
- 1997  National Chamber of the Electronics, Telecommunications and Informatics Industry, CANIETI 
- 2007  Mexican Electronics Telecommunications and Information Technologies Industries Chamber, CANIETI.

resumen:
In the industry of entertainment tech, we stand to revolutionize the way people connect, build communities and co-create value through interactive content since 2009.

We empower brands to establish deep connections with consumers through 360¬∞ gaming solutions. We release the potential of artificial intelligence to enhance meaningful connections between businesses and customers.

We are Game Changers.

resumen:
Nearsoft helps you grow your development team with a dedicated team of +300 engineers in Mexico.  You end with *one* integrated team, where everybody speaks the same language, shares the same values, and gets up and goes to sleep at the same time.

Companies come to us because they are,

1. Disappointed with "offshoring".
2. Frustrated because they can't scale their software development team.
3. Tired of late product releases and poor quality.

We work exclusively with software product companies like OpenTable, Switchfly, Points, JumpstartMD, and others.

And now, we are Encora:

resumen:
Grupo Allianz fue fundado en Alemania en 1890, desde esa fecha comenz√≥ a labrarse un camino de √©xitos y constante crecimiento, logrando ser hoy en d√≠a una de las compa√±√≠as l√≠deres a nivel mundial en el sector asegurador, ofreciendo productos en seguros y administraci√≥n de activos. Esta experiencia sin duda alguna ha llevado a Allianz a ser una empresa s√≥lida que pone en primer lugar las necesidades de sus clientes, esforz√°ndose al m√°ximo por ganar la confianza de cada uno de ellos.

Grupo Allianz tiene presencia en 70 pa√≠ses. Sus 142,000 empleados atienden a m√°s de 78 millones de clientes en todo el mundo.

Allianz M√©xico cuenta con una oficina matriz en la Ciudad de M√©xico y cinco oficinas regionales con una extensa red de agentes de seguros, lo cual permite brindar un servicio de calidad a lo largo y ancho del pa√≠s. Esto ha valido para alcanzar la calificaci√≥n de Standard & Poor¬¥s "A- (mxAAA)", la calificaci√≥n m√°s alta que se otorga a nivel nacional y obtenida gracias a la confirmaci√≥n de su solidez financiera y la calidad de sus servicios.

Gracias a su capital humano ampliamente capacitado, la lucha continua por posicionarse en el mercado internacional a trav√©s de adquisiciones y alianzas estrat√©gicas, y sobre todo, su compromiso por ofrecer productos de primer nivel en las √°reas de beneficios, da√±os y soluciones patrimoniales.

resumen:
INDELPRO is one of the companies of Alpek, the Petrochemical Group of Grupo Alfa, and is the only producer of polypropylene resins in Mexico. Alpek's partner in this company is LyondellBasell, a global leader in polyolefin technology and production.

INDELPRO began its operations in March 1992 and has since marketed its products under the brands Valtec, Profax, Axlene, and Sphertec; products developed under strict quality standards. Our plant is located in Altamira, Tamaulipas, where the port infrastructure facilitates the reception of raw materials and the supply of products to our customers. Our headquarters are located in the municipality of Garza Garc√≠a, N.L., and we have sales offices in Mexico City.

INDELPRO successfully markets its products throughout the USMCA area, as well as Central and South America. Currently, INDELPRO has two polypropylene production lines, which provide us with the capacity to produce 690,000 tons annually.
